trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Kudos | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Kudos | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Kudos with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Kudos with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Kudos
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Kudos

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=528191).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=528191).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Kudos.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Kudos.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Kudos tenant
trans-unit.target: A Kudos tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Kudos will be able to single sign into the application at your Kudos company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Kudos will be able to single sign into the application at your Kudos company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Kudos
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Kudos

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Kudos
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Kudos

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Kudos.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Kudos.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Kudos, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Kudos, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **Kudos**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **Kudos**.

trans-unit.source: Application Gallery
trans-unit.target: Application Gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Kudos**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Kudos**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Kudos
trans-unit.target: Kudos

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Kudos with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Kudos with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: As part of this procedure, you are required to create a base-64 encoded certificate file.
trans-unit.target: As part of this procedure, you are required to create a base-64 encoded certificate file.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to convert a binary certificate into a text file](http://youtu.be/PlgrzUZ-Y1o).
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to convert a binary certificate into a text file](http://youtu.be/PlgrzUZ-Y1o).

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Kudos** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Kudos** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Kudos** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Kudos** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Kudos Sign On URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*https://company.kudosnow.com*", and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Kudos Sign On URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*https://company.kudosnow.com*", and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Kudos** page, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Kudos** page, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your Kudos company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your Kudos company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: Settings

trans-unit.source: Click **Integrations \> SSO**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Integrations \> SSO**.

trans-unit.source: In the **SSO** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **SSO** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: SSO
trans-unit.target: SSO

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Kudos** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-On Service URL** value, and then paste it into the **Sign on URL ** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Kudos** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-On Service URL** value, and then paste it into the **Sign on URL ** textbox.

trans-unit.source: Create a **base-64 encoded** file from your downloaded certificate.
trans-unit.target: Create a **base-64 encoded** file from your downloaded certificate.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [How to convert a binary certificate into a text file](http://youtu.be/PlgrzUZ-Y1o)
trans-unit.target: For more details, see [How to convert a binary certificate into a text file](http://youtu.be/PlgrzUZ-Y1o)

trans-unit.source: Open your base-64 encoded certificate in notepad, copy the content of it into your clipboard, and then paste it to the **X.509 certificate** textbox
trans-unit.target: Open your base-64 encoded certificate in notepad, copy the content of it into your clipboard, and then paste it to the **X.509 certificate** textbox

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Kudos** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-Out Service URL** value, and then paste it into the **Logout To URL ** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at Kudos** dialog page, copy the **Single Sign-Out Service URL** value, and then paste it into the **Logout To URL ** textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the **Your Kudos URL** textbox, type your company name.
trans-unit.target: In the **Your Kudos URL** textbox, type your company name.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Kudos, they must be provisioned into Kudos.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Kudos, they must be provisioned into Kudos.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Kudos, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Kudos, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Log in to your **Kudos** company site as administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your **Kudos** company site as administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: Settings

trans-unit.source: Click **User Admin**.
trans-unit.target: Click **User Admin**.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Users** tab, and then click **Add a user**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Users** tab, and then click **Add a user**.

trans-unit.source: User Admin
trans-unit.target: User Admin

trans-unit.source: In the **Add a User** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **Add a User** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Add a User
trans-unit.target: Add a User

trans-unit.source: Type the **First Name**, **Last Name**, **Email** and other details of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type the **First Name**, **Last Name**, **Email** and other details of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create User**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create User**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]You can use any other Kudos user account creation tools or APIs provided by Kudos to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]You can use any other Kudos user account creation tools or APIs provided by Kudos to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Kudos, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Kudos, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Kudos **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Kudos **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign users
trans-unit.target: Assign users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
